short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ze CRM extension for more productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Ze Crm extension you can easily synchronize your unrecognized contacts from whatsapp chats with your Crm contacts and get details like their Name and Company directly from your Ze Crm directory information.
